attributes.action: Send help to Durban, South Africa
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to help, be it by helping send food and medical supplies, offering to help the South African government restore order
attributes.background: The citizens of Durban are facing a terrible time - civil unrest - shops and businesses being looted, the South African police cannot cope alone

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592030
